idea:
DOCMEN, is essentially a digital document management software developed by EMP Technologies. We, at EMP believes the vision of a paperless future which is constituted from the factual concept of eliminating the process exchanging physical documents in all ways. 

 

Sharing documents should be the easiest task today and not a hassle of it being lost and especially not being found when it is needed the most. 


Today, sharing documents digitally doesn't just sound the right thing to do, it also feels the right thing to do. EMP technologies enables that via DOCMEN and will take this vision with a mission of enabling people around the world to do so in every possible manner.
name: EMP TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
To Provide consultancy, advisory, support, logistics, management, staffing services in the field of information technology, engineering, retail sectors to customers across India and overseas.

To run Business process outsourcing unit for the purpose of carrying out main objects of the company.

idea:
We provide our clients with the most comprehensive list of cat and dog breeds, along with the behaviours and traits that are associated with each breed, for their convenience. We bring to our clients the most authentic information about each breed that we have mentioned on our website.

Every pet happens to have different dietary requirements which depend on a great number of factors such as environment, breed, health conditions etc. We house a huge number of pet food brands such as Genesis, Orijen, Prama, Trixie, Purina ONE, and many more top-notch pet food brands that are just the right ones for client’s pet health. In return of the affection, love, and joy client’s dog or cat possibly gives them, they would undeniably want to reward their pet with a lovely treat, isn’t it? Being pet owners ourselves, we completely understand our customers and that is the very reason why we provide them with the best range of treat choices for their pets including the Italian salami snacks, salmon snacks, chicken liver snacks, and much more. We not only deal with the best quality pet food in the market but also provide them with the highest quality pet accessories which include toys, feeders, odour and stain removers, shampoos, conditioners and much more.

 

Our product “interactive dog toys” is our innovation. It is built for urban parents who don’t generally have time to stay around pets all the time. These interactive toys can be operated from a distance through Bluetooth. Hence, helping pet owners to interact with their pets from far. Product link: https://pawsindia.com/collections/dog-toys/products/wickedbone
name: WINDLOCK PROJECT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Do-it Impex Private Ltd, The Certified ISO 9001:2015, an Indian company aims to provide cutting edge technology and superior products to International Gems & Jewellery Industry. The company engaged in the field of import - export, manufacturing and trading of machinery, plating chemicals and consumables for the gems and jewellery industry. In a very short span of time Do-it Impex, has built its Image not only in Indian market but also in the overseas market to serve the Gem & jewellery Industry, in view of its latest technological know-how, constant research and development, innovative marketing strategies and prompt post-sales support, in order to better serve the distinguished needs of its prestigious clients.


We support our Honorable Prime Minister in addressing ‘Make In INDIA’ and  believe in “VOCAL WITH LOCAL”  strategy.
name: DO-IT IMPEX PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. Food for Thought is an e-commerce health supplement company. We have the distinction of being India’s first cognitive health supplement brand. 

At this moment we are selling 2 products - primarily through our e-commerce website & Amazon India online marketplace.

Our first product is India’s first holistic brain health supplement called Thrive. It is a blend of 8 nutrients (including vitamins, amino acids & herbs) that are proven to boost long-term brain health naturally. It is available in vegan capsule form. Users have reported improvements in their focus, energy, mood, memory, sleep quality & a reduction in stress levels.

Our second product is India’s first energy supplement in a mint form - it is called BOOM! Energy. It is a very energy product as it is in the form of sugar-free mints. Each mint contains caffeine & l-theanine - 2 ingredients that are proven to give a sustained energy boost without any side effects like jitters or a crash.  

All our products are safe - they are vegan, gluten-free, sugar-free soy-free & manufactured in a facility approved by the FSSAI & FDA.

Over the last 9 months since we started selling, the brand has been able to establish product-market fit by acquiring 1000+ customers & maintaining a 20%+ returning customer rate. Our gross revenue in this period has been approximately INR 30-32 lacs.
name: TMB LIFESTYLE LLP

idea:
Seven Billion Technologies Private Limited operating in the brand name of Nector.IO provides SaaS Solutions for Low code loyalty and engagement for businesses. 

Nector powers loyalty, engagement and rewarding for your business in as less as 30 minutes. We supercharge businesses by boosting sales, repeat purchases, RTO protection and many more things.
name: SEVEN BILLION TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Find Me A Property aka FMAP is a property management firm that operates with a view to resolve challenges that one may face while buying, selling or renting a property. Our services also expand to helping individuals find the right rental properties, both short-term and long-term as well as assisting them with the process of finding the most compatible flat-mates, if need be.

We have been constantly growing with 20-25% growth rate and Will put a position for ourselves in this fast growing Real Estate Industry
name: FMAP-Find Me A Property
